Author: zerocaloriewater
Text: ugh i hate breakups, i’m so sorry... but what helped me was to start a routine! whenever im stuck home in bed, i get way 2 in my head & binge first thing in the morning and it’s a downward spiral for the rest of the day. now, i try to go workout every morning. if i don’t, then i’ll walk to campus and work on assignments at the library. basically: be. productive. try get ur mind off food like the rest of the world does until it feels a bit more under ur control. and the (albeit, minimal-moderate) calories burnt keep me in check to not end everything off with a binge. like, i did NOT work my ass off just to fuck myself up. it kinda uhh, boosts ur confidence a little y’know? and gets u that temp self-respect til it’s a habit.
